name: difeq1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c2), cdif(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4g(cdif(c0, c2), cdif(c1, c2), crab(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), crab(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c2), cdif(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crab(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), crab(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
-| wceq(cdif(c0, c2), crab(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
-| wceq(cdif(c1, c2), crab(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))

-| wceq(cdif(c1, c2), crab(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))

-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

-| wceq(cdif(c0, c2), crab(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
-| wceq(cdif(c1, c2), crab(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))

-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

comment: Equality theorem for class difference. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1997.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
